txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Monstrous heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature surrounding the outpost of Gwingris. You can return the items to Maedlathron at Gwingris in Eregion for reward.
'I will send this on to be studied by our scholars. Thank you.'

'This land has been twisted by perversions of nature. All the natural creatures -- the lurkers and Huorns -- have gone wild and have become violent. We must collect everything from them and study them well. We should also take the broken weapons from the Wood-trolls.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Monstrous Heartwood
Maedlathron awaits the return of a collection of monstrous heartwood at the Elf-encampment at Gwingris.
Deliver the monstrous heartwood to Maedlathron in Gwingris within Eregion
You have accepted a task to deliver monstrous heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature near and surrounding the Elf-encampment of Gwingris to the Elf Maedlathron.
Wanted: Monstrous heartwood from the twisted creatures of nature surrounding the outpost of Gwingris.
